title: Narrative Photography
contents: Please bring 5 pictures from your childhood that capture who you are, what you love, where you're from, and/or the people who have helped shape you.
Click on the arrows above to view assignment details.

title: Plant & Animal Cell Foldable
contents: Discover the similartities and differences between animal and plant cells. You will label and define various organelles that can be found inside a plant and animal cells using the foldable template (although, if you prefer, you may freehand the drawing of the cell).
Click on the arrows above to view assignment details.

title: Unit Rate Check-In
contents: You will solve four unit rate problems. You must include the units to receive full credit (e.g., miles/hour or words/minute). You must show your work. Please circle or box your final answer.
Click on the arrows above to view assignment details
